quote: Insaan ke liye wahi kuch hai jiske liye woh koshish kare.
author: Noble Quran

quote: Aqalmand hai woh shakhs jo anjaam soch kar kaam kare.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Sabr ek aisi sawaari hai jo apne sawaar ko kabhi girne nahin deti.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Behtareen insaan woh hai jo gusse mein bhi insaaf kare.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Aqalmand hai woh shakhs jo anjam soch kar kaam kare.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Sabr ek aisi sawari hai jo apne sawar ko kabhi girne nahi deti.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Haq baat kehna sab se bada imaan hai.
author: Hazrat Ali (R.A.)

quote: Ek aisi aawaaz hai jo alfaazon ka istemaal nahin karti, usey sun.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Tumhari ghaltiyan bhi tumhein sachai tak le ja sakti hain.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Mohabbat ke baghair har moseeqi shor hai, har raqs pagalpan hai aur har ibaadat bojh hai.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Jab insaan ki aankhon se aansu behte hain to us par Rab ki rehmat barasti hai.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Tumhari asal hasti tumhari soch hai, baqi to sirf haddiyaan aur khaali gosht hai.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Jab duniya wale tumhein ghatne tekne par majboor kar dein, to yeh behtareen waqt hai sajde ka.
author: Maulana Rūmī ؒ

quote: Zara nam ho to ye mitti badi zarkhez hai saaqi.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Zindagi riyazi ka sawaal nahin jiska jawab maloom ho sake.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Khamoshi bhi ek jawaabi daleel hoti hai; har baat ka jawab zaroori nahin.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Waqt to waqt par badalta hai, lekin insaan kisi bhi waqt badal sakta hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Aaj ka insaan har cheez mein fayda dhoondta hai, chahe wo rishte hi kyun na hon.
author: Jon Elia

quote: Jo log doosron ke dard nahin samajhte, woh kabhi apne dard ka ilaaj nahin kar paate.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Ilm woh roshni hai jo andheron mein bhi raasta dikhati hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Rishte wahi sahi hote hain jo har haalat mein saath nibhaaein.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Aasaan raste aksar manzil tak nahin le jaate.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Khud se jung jeet jao, baaqi sab aasaan hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Har shakhs ko padhne ki koshish karo; har shakhs ek kitaab hai.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Waqt sab kuch sikha deta hai, bas sabr ki zaroorat hoti hai.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Aansoo bhi apna ek asar rakhte hain, bas samajhne wala chahiye.
author: Parveen Shakir

quote: Jo log apni soch nahin badalte, woh kabhi apni zindagi nahin badal sakte.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Tajurba woh kamyabi hai jo ghaltion ki lagan se milti hai.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Kamyabi ka raaz sirf do lafzon mein hai - sabr aur koshish.
author: Munir Niazi

quote: Tumhare irade agar mazboot hain to har mushkil rasta aasaan lagta hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Aksar log samajhne ke liye nahin, sirf sunne ke liye hote hain.
author: Bano Qudsia

quote: Jise khud se mohabbat ho, woh kabhi kisi ko dukh nahin deta.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Waqt ki parakh sab kuch bayaan kar deti hai.
author: Bushra Rehman

quote: Jo log sirf fayda dekhte hain, woh kabhi wafadar nahin hote.
author: Munir Niazi

quote: Aansoo woh zubaan hai jo har dil samajhta hai.
author: Faiz Ahmad Faiz

quote: Har shanakht ke peeche ek kahaani hoti hai.
author: Mustansar Hussain Tarar

quote: Rishte wo nahin hote jo sirf naam ke hote hain; rishte wo hote hain jo dard mein saath dete hain.
author: Umera Ahmed

quote: Tumhara dard tumhara hai; log sirf afsos karte hain.
author: Jon Elia

quote: Aam insaan galti karta hai, lekin aqalmund usi mein seekhta hai.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Zindagi ka husn us waqt samajh aata hai jab waqt nikal jaata hai.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Insaan tabhi samajhdar banta hai jab dard ka samna karta hai.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Khushi sirf unhi logon ko milti hai jo doosron ke liye jeete hain.
author: Abdul Sattar Eidi

quote: Nafrat se nafrat barti hai, mohabbat se mohabbat.
author: Faiz Ahmad Faiz

quote: Log us waqt yaad karte hain jab unhein zaroorat hoti hai.
author: Ahmad Faraz

quote: Aap jitna kam bolte ho, utna zyada log aapki baat ka intezaar karte hain.
author: Bano Qudsia

quote: Zindagi kisi ke intezaar mein guzarna bhi ek fun hai.
author: Parveen Shakir

quote: Khamoshi ka matlab hamesha raza-mandi nahin hota.
author: Umera Ahmed

quote: Jo waqt ke saath chalta hai, wahi waqt se aage nikalta hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Sabr rakh, har andhera raasta roshni tak jaata hai.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Zindagi mein har shakhs tumhara humsafar nahi hota.
author: Umera Ahmed

quote: Aankhon mein pani rakhna, zubaan par dua rakhna.
author: Bano Qudsia

quote: Jo gham se dosti kar le, woh kabhi tanha nahi hota.
author: Jon Elia

quote: Sahi waqt par chhup rehna bhi aqalmandi hoti hai.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Jis ne dard diya, usi ne sabr bhi sikha diya.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Waqt kisi ka nahi hota, bas dikhawa karta hai.
author: Anwar Masood

quote: Soch badalne se taqdeer badal jaati hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Har lafz ka ek asar hota hai, har asar ka ek waqt.
author: Sir Syed Ahmad Khan

quote: Jab tak khud par yaqeen nahi hota, koi kuch nahi kar sakta.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Insaan ka asal libaas uska akhlaaq hota hai.
author: Abdul Sattar Eidi

quote: Kamyabi ki sabse achi tareeqe - kabhi rukna nahi.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Sahih faisle aksar tanha log hi karte hain.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Zindagi us waqt behtareen hoti hai jab aap khud ko samajhne lagte hain.
author: Mustansar Hussain Tarar

quote: Waqt to waqt par badalta hai, lekin insan kisi bhi waqt badal sakta hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi ganit ka sawal nahi jiska jawab maloom ho sake.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Khamoshi bhi ek jawabi daleel hoti hai; har baat ka jawab zaroori nahi.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Aaj ka insan har cheez mein faida dhoondhta hai, chahe woh rishte hi kyun na ho.
author: Jon Elia

quote: Zindagi jeene ke do hi tareeqe hain - ek woh jo ho raha hai usse bardasht karo, doosra zimmedari uthao use badalne ki.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Jab tak tum khud se nahi haarte, koi tumhe hara nahi sakta.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Log kehte hain waqt guzarta hai, lekin waqt nahi guzarta - hum guzarte hain.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Jo log doosron ke dard nahi samajhte, woh kabhi apne dard ka ilaj nahi kar paate.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Ilm woh roshni hai jo andheron mein bhi raasta dikhati hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Rishte wahi sahi hote hain jo har halat mein sath nibhayein.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Aasan raste aksar manzil tak nahi le jaate.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Kamyabi ke liye pehle khud ko pehchanna padta hai.
author: Allama Iqbal

quote: Aap ka leja sab se pehla asar chhodta hai, lafz baad mein aate hain.
author: Ashfaq Ahmed

quote: Falsafa wohi hai jo zindagi mein roshni laaye.
author: Mustansar Hussain Tarar

quote: Tanhai ko samajhne wale log kam milte hain.
author: Mirza Ghalib

quote: Mohabbat us waqt tak hai jab tak ehtram baqi hai.
author: Umera Ahmed

quote: Jo log sirf kaam ke waqt yaad aayein, unhe yaad na hi rakho to behtar hai.
author: Anwar Masood

quote: Sabr rakh, har andhera raasta roshni tak jaata hai.
author: Wasif Ali Wasif

quote: Umeed zinda rakhna, chahe har dar band kyun na ho.
author: Faiz Ahmad Faiz

quote: Zindagi mein har shakhs tumhara humsafar nahi hota.
author: Umera Ahmed

quote: Aankhon mein pani rakhna, zubaan par dua rakhna.
author: Bano Qudsia

quote: Zehar bhi asar karta hai agar koi meetha keh kar de.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi ek safar hai, jo har mod par kuch nayi baatein sikhaata hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Jo kuch tum apne liye karte ho, wahi tumhare liye sabse behtar hota hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Apne sapnon ki taraf kadam badhao, duniya tumhare raste mein rukawat nahi dal sakti.
author: Unknown

quote: Jab tum apni himmat aur hausle se kaam karte ho, tab kuch bhi mushkil nahi hota.
author: Unknown

quote: Jo cheez tumhe kabhi nahi mili, wo tumhare liye nahi thi.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi ka asli maqsad apni khushi dhoondhna hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Kamyab log mushkilat mein bhi raasta nikal lete hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi bhar ehsas-e-dard ke aansu hain, phir bhi raat ke baad savera aati hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Khud ko badalne ki himmat rakho, duniya khud tumhari muhabbat se badal jayegi.
author: Unknown

quote: Jo kabhi haar nahin maante, unki jeet nishchit hoti hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Mushkilaat ne zindagi jeene ke liye tayyar kar diya, ab gham bhi humse na darenge.
author: Unknown

quote: Naseeb unhe milte hain jo shiddat se koshish karte hain.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi ka asal maqsad khush rehna hai, kisi ke liye jeena nahi.
author: Unknown

quote: Tumhari jeet tumhare hausle par depend karti hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Jitne se zindagi me behtari aati hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Zindagi me tabdeeliyan lana sab se mushkil kaam hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Agar manzil achhi ho to rasta mushkil nahi lagta.
author: Unknown

quote: Jitni zyada pareshaniyan, utna hi zyada waqt kaam ka hota hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Khush rehna zindagi ka sabse bada amal hai.
author: Unknown

quote: Har mushkil waqt ka ek acha din hota hai.
author: Unknown
